thirubadu rahithawa aanayanaya karanu labana ek wahanayak wenuwen samanyayen ru.
ema sahathikaya adala pradeshiya lekam wisin sahathika kara thibima aniwarya we.

ee anuwa ema rohal thula prathikara labamin sitiyadi warin wara sidu kala pisiaar parikshanayanhi prathipala anuwa adala wairasaya thawaduratath ema nawikayinge siruru thula nomathi bawa thahawuru wima nisa melesa eeye dinaye di ema rohal wethin muda harimata katayuthu kara atha. mema nawika hamuda pudgalayin 33 dena da athuluwa me wana wita wairasaya aasadhanaya wi rohal gatha kala samastha nawika hamuda samajikayin sankhyawen nawika hamuda pudgalayin 283k suwaya laba rohalwalin pitathwa gos thibe.

nathnam pihiya pawichchi karannata thuwala wenawa.
ko mage gal aayudha kali...tika...
kotinma gedara sitinawata wada wadi kalayak aadi shishya sangam karyalaye gathakala yuthuya.
oya kiyana swabhawika natya kala wadaya api wedikawata ena dawaswala pumbala thibunu thathwayak.
mema mathiwarana rajakariwala niratha wana polis niladharin kriyathmaka kala yuththe baladharin labadena nithyanukula niyoga pamani.
nawa rajaya yatathe me sambandhayen swadhina parikshanayak pawathwenu athayi thaman balaporoththuwana bawayi aya pawasuwe.
thawa thawath poth hadunwa denna.
dinapatha dahas gananakata sewaya karana tram ratha warin wara anathurak wiya hakiya.
